verbs.description: sb i-880 to [V: close] [ARGM-TMP: overnight] [ARGM-TMP: at 23rd ave] [ARGM-PRP: for over crossing work] southbound interstate highway 880 will be closed at 23rd avenue from 11 59 p m sunday until 5 a m monday as caltrans continues work on a new over crossing oakland california caltrans calif california department of transportation oakland flaggers
